property.name: text
property.value: At 120 km/hr, if cars appear every 3 seconds, they will be 100m apart.

property.name: text
property.value: Delay ramp arrivals so that they don't start appearing until the freeway cars have started arriving at the ramp entrance.

property.name: text
property.value: Here, we operate open loop, so the ramp cars travel at maxRampSpeed towards the merge.

property.name: script
